Articles.Content:
I am running the latest windows build of KSP but whenever I am building a vessel the thud engine just has a white texture and seems to attach differently to how it is supposed to attach. When the ship is launched the engine still has no texture but it works an still displays the exhaust effect. 

I have tried reloading the database several times but it has had no affect. Several of the craft is this particular save have been copied from the previous update but I don't think this makes any difference as the same thing happens on all of my saves and craft. 

My computer has 12gb of ram and a 2gb NVIDIA graphics card if that helps.

Here is my output log: https://www.dropbox.com/s/4e85ubru8dv0re8/output_log.txt?dl=0

Thanks
Well i am not so good in this area, but its really sad that you cant see the texture in game it´s pretty good...

I'm kind of with Fisk02 on this. Don't have a clue as to how to fix this. I'm sure someone will happen along with some ideas. However, in the mean time revel in the thought of being the only kid on the block who has an albino thud!
Hi @mrmcp1, please unzip a new copy of KSP to C:\Games and run that copy instead.

49 minutes ago, sal_vager said:

Hi @mrmcp1, please unzip a new copy of KSP to C:\Games and run that copy instead.

 

Thanks I will give that a go

EDIT: Thanks, the engine now has a texture 

Edited December 20, 2015 by mrmcp1
